title: Cancer survivors face significant hardships related to medical bills

title_detail.value: Cancer survivors face significant hardships related to medical bills

summary: New research indicates that cancer survivors carry greater financial burdens related to medical debt payments and bills compared with individuals without a cancer history, with the greatest hardships in younger survivors.

summary_detail.value: New research indicates that cancer survivors carry greater financial burdens related to medical debt payments and bills compared with individuals without a cancer history, with the greatest hardships in younger survivors.
